医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现人畜共患病溢出流行病呈指数级增长对 60 年历史流行病学数据的分析发现，在流行病规模越来越大、越来越频繁的总体模式中，四种类型的动物传染人类（人畜共患）感染一直在以“指数速度”增加。开放获取期刊《BMJ 全球健康》。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Zoonotic-spillover-epidemics-increasing-at-exponential-rate-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Zoonotic-spillover-epidemics-increasing-at-exponential-rate-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edbeef7d-cbd5-46cb-91c0-d764b50f86b3 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 12:36:00 -0400 Zoonotic spillover epidemics increasing at exponential rate, study finds
气温上升构成迫在眉睫的威胁：到本世纪中叶，极端高温可能会提高美国居民的心血管死亡率研究人员估计了美国与高温相关的严重心血管死亡负担的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Rising-temporals-pose-looming-threat-Extreme-heat-could-elevate-cardioangio-mortality-for-US-residents-by-mid century.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Rising-temporals-pose-looming-threat-Extreme-heat-could-elevate-cardioangio-mortality-for-US-residents-by-mid century.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3023c1dc-bfa8-405d-946e-96804fbf64d8 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 12:32:00 -0400 Rising temperatures pose looming threat: Extreme heat could elevate cardiovascular mortality for US residents by midcentury
AI 高精度预测高危患者青光眼进展网上发表的研究发现，经过训练识别视网膜图像和临床信息中的危险信号的人工智能（AI）可以预测青光眼高危人群（通常被称为“青光眼嫌疑人”）是否以及何时继续实际开发青光眼在英国眼科杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/AI-predicts-glaucoma-progression-in-high-risk-病人-with-high-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/AI-predicts-glaucoma-progression-in-high-risk-病人-with-high-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4e137b0-f7fe-4635-ad42-a9b27d55cc78 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 12:28:00 -0400 AI predicts glaucoma progression in high-risk patients with high accuracy
大流行期间的远程工作与更高的育儿压力有关，尤其是对父亲而言西北大学和芝加哥 Ann & Robert H. Lurie 儿童医院的科学家进行的一项新调查显示，在 COVID-19 大流行期间远程工作的家长中有 40% 表示养育压力更大，而现场工作的家长中只有 27% 的比例更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Teleworking-during-the-pandemic-linked-to-higher-parenting-stress-special-for-fathers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Teleworking-during-the-pandemic-linked-to-higher-parenting-stress-special-for-fathers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a100a732-4288-4912-87e3-772da275030b Fri, 03 Nov 2023 12:20:00 -0400 Teleworking during the pandemic linked to higher parenting stress, especially for fathers
分析发现医疗保健专业人员对跨性别者存在隐性偏见通过分析哈佛内隐关联测试的数据（一种被广泛接受的衡量一个人基于种族、性别和性取向等特征对人的态度的指标），研究人员发现医疗保健专业人员，尤其是护士，对跨性别者更加有偏见比非医疗保健专业人员的人更重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Analysis-finds-implicit-bias-of-healthcare-professionals-towards-transgender-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Analysis-finds-implicit-bias-of-healthcare-professionals-towards-transgender-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0283a1c5-783b-40cb-9164-636a8c8c7ae6 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 12:14:00 -0400 Analysis finds implicit bias of healthcare professionals towards transgender people
高影响力的临床试验结果将于 2023 年 ASN 肾脏周上公布众多可能影响肾脏相关医疗护理的高影响力临床试验的结果将于 11 月 1 日至 5 日在 2023 年 ASN 肾脏周上现场公布。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/High-impact-clinical-trial-results-to-be-presented-at-ASN-Kidney-Week-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/High-impact-clinical-trial-results-to-be-presented-at-ASN-Kidney-Week-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9aa205cb-a0b2-41fe-9bd4-ad0adc2f3d06 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 12:08:00 -0400 High-impact clinical trial results to be presented at ASN Kidney Week 2023
波士顿大学研究人员获得资助，以改善服务不足的儿童和年轻人的行为健康护理Carryl P. Navalta 博士是波士顿大学 Chobanian & Avedisian 医学院精神病学临床副教授，他的研究“Project EDUCATE”（教育项目）获得了美国卫生与公众服务部为期两年、价值 476,194 美元的资助有效提供和利用儿童和青少年治疗）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/BU-researcher-receives-grant-to-improve-behavioral-health-care-for-underserved-kids-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/BU-researcher-receives-grant-to-improve-behavioral-health-care-for-underserved-kids-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4d68b88-d298-40f6-bfdd-04e38e344e99 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 12:01:00 -0400 BU researcher receives grant to improve behavioral health care for underserved kids, young adults
科学家发现可以彻底改变骨关节炎治疗的祖细胞研究人员报告称，骨关节炎是由 Gremlin 1 (Grem1) 谱系软骨祖细胞的丢失引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Scientists-identify-progenitor-cells-that-c​​ould-revolutionize-osteoarthritis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Scientists-identify-progenitor-cells-that-c​​ould-revolutionize-osteoarthritis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f40b7254-9ced-448f-9f74-f4ebde8f3df5 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 11:54:00 -0400 Scientists identify progenitor cells that could revolutionize osteoarthritis treatment
与女性相比，男性不太愿意分享负面信息，也不太可能分享负面信息卡内基梅隆大学、贝叶斯商学院（前卡斯商学院）和博科尼大学的一项新研究发现，男性比女性更不愿意分享负面信息，也更可能分享负面信息，而在正面新闻方面则差别不大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Men-found-to-be-less-eager-and-likely-to-share-negative-information-than-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Men-found-to-be-less-eager-and-likely-to-share-negative-information-than-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0eb83b2-380e-4579-a91f-cecb5bf061be Fri, 03 Nov 2023 11:53:00 -0400
开发综合数据库以帮助了解蛋白质聚集的基础IBB-UAB 的研究人员开发了迄今为止最全面的数据库，以帮助了解蛋白质聚集的基础，这是一种与衰老和多种病理相关的现象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/A-compressive-database-development-to-help-understand-the-basis-of- Protein-aggregation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/A-compressive-database-development-to-help-understand-the-basis-of- Protein-aggregation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e366c18f-4ae3-4b40-883f-c4ab9559455c Fri, 03 Nov 2023 11:45:00 -0400 A comprehensive database developed to help understand the basis of protein aggregation
